extension.name: Show Script
extension.author: Jitendra Khatri
extension.description: This plugin is able to show your javascript on every page of your Front-end joomla site.

field.name: script_code
field.description: Your JavaScript Code which you want to show on every page your site's front-end
field.label: JavaScript Code

field.name: script_url
field.description: URL of JavaScript, Note: You must have to enter full URL of your JavaScript File.
field.label: URL of JavaScript
